doc.title: Ek Aur Suhagan (????)
doc.plot: There are thousand of cheap roadside prostitutes who live and die like animals very few of them sometimes dream to get married and see the light of happiness. But one in millions gets a chance to get married and become Ek Aur Suhagan. Yes "Ek Aur Suhagan" is a bold, fast, emotional and a rare story of a prostitute Champa Bai, who for just two nights got married to an innocent hardworking and god fearing villager (Murli). He is a simple man cannot understand the strange behaviour of his wife who behaves cheaply like a typical prostitute.On the surface it makes you laugh but deep inside, there is emotion.The husband decides to turn this prostitute into a decent housewife with the determination and help of neighbours, he ultimately succeeds.
